cause.description:
Without alternatives to corporate media Americans will continue getting a skewed view of current events. Media based on advertising will always be driven toward sensationalism.
Don't we feel the information we seek has real value and deserves direct support, instead of filtered portions of junk food or automobile industry profits?
We're on facebook and we have the internet, so chances are we have some money. Even if you're short on cash, you can contribute by recruiting friends who are fellow NPR listeners.
Media affects everything. Any and all support is worthwhile.
1. As an alternative to corporate media, NPR depends on support from its listeners.
2. We are those listeners.
3. NPR is depending on our support.
4. Let's do it.
cause.mission: To support and raise funds for National Public Radio!
cause.name: National Public Radio
